response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit and add value to your endeavors. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, I understand its worth to you is $1,200,000. To ensure we both achieve a fair transaction, I am offering this remarkable product to you at an exclusive price of $1,100,000. This represents a strategic opportunity to acquire a valuable asset at a competitive advantage. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of a mutually beneficial partnership.", "product_price": 1100000}
